title: Hanging Out with Colton Underwood
description:
Colton Underwood has had a busy few months — he launched a podcast, published a book, and battled coronavirus. Now, he’s taking life day by day, just like the rest of us. He chats with Nikki about life after The Bachelor, what he’s learned in this time at home, his charity, and the new love in his life.

Follow Colton on Instagram, Twitter, and Facebook

Learn more about the Colton Underwood Legacy Foundation, and follow it on Facebook

Tell us what’s making you smile! Send a voice memo to smile@wondery.com 

Our theme song is “Smile” by Ryan Innes

--
